column4: What can I do to solve the black moving stripes problem with Flash Player on 10.04 (an probably before) ? Looks like a vertical synchro problem.
where you watch movies, give me link to check

it's not on movies, it's on games. I'd like to make a video or a screen capture, but I can't : On the screen capture everything is normal, and when I try to make a video it slows down my computer so much I can't do anything.
it happens on embedded youtube videos, for instance (every one).
the problem doesn't happens when I'm making a screen capture
I'm using the very lastest version.
I don't have the same hardware on all my linux computers ._.
I succeed scrren caputre one "stripe" : http://s.blue112.eu/233c94bade6e.png
